name: Battle Feel
description:
Battle Feel


Battle Feel is set on an PvP map. The game can playable online-singleplayer, Battle Feel has a total of 2 teams, 2 map. It is a fun competitive game.

Preview
Search & Destory
Deathmatch
Rush
Capture the Flag

  • The game takes place on an PvP map
  • You can play online or singplayer
  • There are many types of content available
